description.value:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-animal-companions.AC-Support.Item.9Y5QKMvy0KsliE29]{Moth Support Benefit}

If you damage a Concealed or Hidden creature in your moth's reach with a Strike, that creature requires only a DC 3 Flat Check to target it if it's concealed, or DC 9 Flat Check if it's hidden.

rules.text: If you damage a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} creature in your moth's reach with a Strike, that creature requires only a @Check[flat|dc:3|showDC:all].
If you damage a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} creature in your moth's reach with a Strike, that creature requires only a @Check[flat|dc:9|showDC:all].
